Package org.eclipse.mosaic.starter

Class MosaicStarter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.mosaic.starter.MosaicStarter
  • public class MosaicStarter
extends Object
    This class contains a main method that configures a Eclipse MOSAIC simulation based on an XML file.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(String[] args)
        Reads all information from the given XML file and starts Eclipse MOSAIC with the read parameters. If successful, the process exits with status code 0, in the case of an error with status code -1.
        Parameters:
        args - parameter list from the command line interface

      • execute

        public void execute​(String[] arguments)
             throws MosaicStarter.ExecutionException
        Reads all information from the given XML file and starts Eclipse MOSAIC with the read parameters.
        Parameters:
        arguments - parameter list from the command line interface
        Throws:
        MosaicStarter.ExecutionException - whenever the execution is configured incorrectly
